plot: When the conflict between two rival labor unions turns violent, Hwang Geon kills a man of the opposing faction. Full of guilt, he decides to raise the son of the slain man.
title: Hanmanheun namilsaeng
plot_es: When the conflict between two rival labor unions turns violent, Hwang Geon kills a man of the opposing faction. Full of guilt, he decides to raise the son of the slain man.
plot_en: When the conflict between two rival labor unions turns violent, Hwang Geon kills a man of the opposing faction. Full of guilt, he decides to raise the son of the slain man.
